# INIntentHandlingStatus.userConfirmationRequired | Apple Developer Documentation

Case# INIntentHandlingStatus.userConfirmationRequired

iOS 12.0+iPadOS 12.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 11.0+tvOS 12.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 5.0+

```
case userConfirmationRequired
```

## [See Also](/documentation/Intents/INIntentHandlingStatus/userConfirmationRequired#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/Intents/INIntentHandlingStatus/userConfirmationRequired#Constants)

[`case unspecified`](/documentation/intents/inintenthandlingstatus/unspecified)The status of the interaction is unknown. This is the default value.[`case ready`](/documentation/intents/inintenthandlingstatus/ready)The intent is ready to be handled, but has not yet been handled.[`case inProgress`](/documentation/intents/inintenthandlingstatus/inprogress)The Intents extension is in the process of handling the intent.[`case success`](/documentation/intents/inintenthandlingstatus/success)The Intents extension successfully handled the intent.[`case failure`](/documentation/intents/inintenthandlingstatus/failure)The Intents extension encountered an unrecoverable problem when handling the intent.[`case deferredToApplication`](/documentation/intents/inintenthandlingstatus/deferredtoapplication)The Intents extension asked its associated app to handle the intent.
